scripts.build: cat ./header.js > synthetic.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- ./base_script.js  >> synthetic.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- ./utils_script.js >> synthetic.js
scripts.copy_paste_js: cat ./header.js > copy_paste.js && cat ./utils_script.js >> copy_paste.js && cat ./base_script.js  >> copy_paste.js
scripts.add: git add ./synthetic.js && git add ../../../../../../copy-paste-example.js && git add .
